name: End of Run
description:
End of Run is a unique tile flipping puzzle game.

Move the player around the board. Each time you move off a board piece, it will vanish making it more challenging to reach your target.

Your goal is to flip the player piece onto the matching gem. Recover all the gems to proceed to the next level and try to finish all the levels!

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=endofrun.twa

Web: https://endofrun.app/
